panels.description: Количество go рутин роботов которые  были остановлены с ошибками. Метрика должна стремиться к 0 в нормальных условиях.
panels.title: Robot Stopped With Errors

panels.description: amount of transactions (counts everything that is in a batch - transaction ids, swaps, multiswaps, keys of swaps and keys of multiswaps) awaiting execution when collector added them into a queue
panels.title: Robot TX waiting process count

panels.description: Количество go рутин роботов которые  были остановлены без ошибок. Метрика должна стремиться к 0 в нормальных условиях.
panels.title: Robots stopped

panels.description: ledger's block num where batch was committed. Takes after every executeBatch
panels.title: Robot Height Ledger Blocks

panels.description: ledger's block rate where batch was committed. Takes after every executeBatch
panels.title: Robot Height Ledger Blocks Rate

panels.description: Batch collects by asking collectors. Batch is ready when one of the batch limits on the number of transactions, size or timeout occurs
panels.title: Batch execute duration seconds  95 percentille

panels.description:
Labels:
robot - robot's destination channel
is_first_attempt - whether it is a first attempt or not - true, false
panels.title: Amount of times request size was exceeded during executeBatch

panels.description:
Labels:
robot - robot's destination channel
channel - robot's source channel
is_first_attempt - whether it is a first attempt or not - true, false
is_src_ch_closed - whether source channel was closed or not - true, false
is_timeout - whether await timeout was reached - true, false
panels.title: Amount of times there was an error on creating HLF events source

panels.description: the block number processing by the collector
panels.title: Collector process block num

panels.description: Relative difference between real and assumed batch size
panels.title: Batch Size Estimated Diff 95 percentille
Amount of executed transactions (in all executed batches)
